t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've at least found somebody I can talk to.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I know that your hair is very long. I must tell you that only women are affected by this enchantment.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't find any cases involving men anywhere in Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Nonsense! My gender can't be the only one...

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Anyway, have you been affected by this?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No, this is how I normally look.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Well, I don't look normal here. My hair only extends down past my shoulders. It extends to my height.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This spell isn't affecting either me or my mother. This seems to only affect you and other women.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you don't want this hair, cut it then!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It's impossible; it will just grow back in seconds.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is a curse, and I'm assuming your mother is to blame.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You don't need to tell me to go see her and I'm not an idiot like you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My mother is locked behind closed doors; you can't see her.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Besides, she has no plans to meet with anybody else. Let me tie your hair in a million knots!
